Sentencas: Yttrium stabilized zirconia (YSZ) used as the state-of-the-art electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) requires high temperature (over 800 degrees C) to realize sufficient oxygen ion conductivity.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications

Sentencas: Thus, the high operational temperature is the main restriction for the commercial process of YSZ-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications

Sentencas: To obtain decent ionic conductivity at intermediate-low temperatures, Sr-free cathode LaNiO3 is introduced into YSZ to construct a novel LaNiO3-YSZ composite electrolyte, which is sandwiched by two Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-delta (NCAL) electrodes to assemble systematical fuel cells.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications

Sentencas: This device presents an excellent peak output of 1045 mW cm(-2) at 600 degrees C and even 399 mW cm(-2) at 450 degrees C. A series of characterizations indicates that the oxygen ion conductivity of the LaNiO3-YSZ composite is significantly promoted in comparison with that of pure YSZ, and the LaNiO3 component has certain proton conductivity after hydrogenation.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications

Sentencas: Both of the two factors contributes to the superior performance of such devices at intermediate-low temperatures.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, the sharp decrease in electronic conductivity for LaNiO3 in hydrogen atmosphere combined with Schottky junction at the anode-electrolyte interface eliminates the short-circuiting problem.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications

Sentencas: Our work demonstrates that incorporating Sr-free cathode LaNiO3 into the YSZ electrolyte is an efficient strategy to boost the performance and reduce the operational temperature of YSZ-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Efficient strategy to boost the electrochemical performance of yttrium stabilized zirconia electrolyte solid oxide fuel cell for low-temperature applications
